def palindrome(counter):
    sum=0
    copy=counter[1]
    last=True
    while copy!=0:
        if copy%10==0 and last==True:
            copy=copy/10
            continue
        last=False
        sum=sum*10
        sum=sum+copy%10
        copy=copy/10
    if counter[1]==sum:
        counter[1]=sum
        return counter
    counter[0]=counter[0]+1
    counter[1]=sum+counter[1]
    return palindrome(counter)

def main():
    t=0
    t=int(raw_input())
    while t!=0 :
        counter=[0]
        counter.append(int(raw_input()))
        counter=palindrome(counter) 
        print str(counter[0])+" "+str(counter[1])
        t=t-1
main()
